
```jsx
import { CTableHeaderCell } from '@coreui/bootstrap-react'
// or
import CTableHeaderCell from '@coreui/bootstrap-react/src/components/table/CTableHeaderCell'
```

| Property | Description | Type | Default |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **className** | A string of all className you want applied to the component. | `string` | - |
| **color** | Sets the color context of the component to one of Bootstrap Reactâ€™s themed colors. | `'primary'` \| `'secondary'` \| `'success'` \| `'danger'` \| `'warning'` \| `'info'` \| `'dark'` \| `'light'` \| `string` | - |
